### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE message (
    message_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id UUID,
    receiver_id UUID,
    message_text TEXT,
    sent_at TIMESTAMP
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE message SET message_text = 'Hello, how are you?' WHERE message_id = '63ec7d3d-4dac-4c5e-90cb-fe9a4e8bbd5c';
